index.name: getOutcome
index.description: Enter outcome code here eg. IDN 101

index.name: mission_location
index.description: Please select the country (or countries) for this mission. Hold down CTRL to select multiple countries.

index.name: theme
index.description: Select the related themes. Hold CTRL to make multiple selections.

index.name: office
index.description: Please select office you belong to. Hold down CTRL to select multiple offices.

index.name: iib_countries
index.description: Countries covered by this report. Hold down CTRL to select multiple countries.

index.name: members
index.description: List of Mission Members. One name per line with principal member first.

index.name: domestic
index.description: Please select whether this was a domestic or international mission

index.name: getAdministrative_unit
index.description: Select Administrative Unit(s). Hold down CTRL to select multiple entries.

index.name: getTechnical_unit
index.description: Select Technical Unit(s). Hold down CTRL to select multiple entries.
